body_html:
@andrehentz the transform_graph works very well currently. I am seeing a better accuracy compared to using quantize_graph, and the inference speed is also faster.

As for the Jetson, I realized the problem of running the quantized graph obtained from the transform_graph tool comes from the TF version (1.0 alpha) not having any quantized operation functions (e.g. QuantizeMul) at all. So I'm trying to update the TF version to something higher that has these operations available.

So I'm trying to update the TF version to something higher that has these operations available.
body:
@andrehentz the transform_graph works very well currently. I am seeing a better accuracy compared to using quantize_graph, and the inference speed is also faster. 

As for the Jetson, I realized the problem of running the quantized graph obtained from the transform_graph tool comes from the TF version (1.0 alpha) not having any quantized operation functions (e.g. QuantizeMul) at all. So I'm trying to update the TF version to something higher that has these operations available.
